original_title: Assistant Secretary General of Parliament Tikiri Jayathilaka appointed HC judge
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe has appointed four new judges of the High Court, including Assistant Secretary General of Parliament Tikiri K. Jayathilaka.
District Judges T.J. Prabhakaran, P.K. Parana Gamage and Senior State counsel K.D.Y.M. Nayani Nirmala Kasthuriratne were among others who were appointed as High Court Judges.
